comment.author: 30515687@N05
comment._content:
One viewer sent us the following comment:

Hi, Just a note that the photograph of the Scott Monument on your flicr page: Library Accession Number: 15/5/3090.01209b  is by Alexander Adam Inglis, who was active as early as the 1870s  until the turn of the century with most of his works dating in the 1880s.  He became a member of the Edinburgh Photographic Society in 1882.  His son, Francis Caird Inglis,  and later his grandsons kept the business operating until 1973. He is identified by his distinct monogram.
